lead_paragraph: ZELANKO--Seymour, a retired tax accountant and partner at Margolin, Winer & Evens for almost five decades, died June 15, 2016 at age 86. He was a brilliant, kind and generous man. Survived by his loving wife of nearly 50 years, Diane (Desreau), his devoted children, Amy Gostfrand and husband Maury and Marc Zelanko and wife Rhonda Weiner, and five grandchildren, Jack, Jess, and Justin Gostfrand and Lilah and Amelia Zelanko. Graveside funeral June 20 at 1pm at New Montefiore Cemetery. 1/3
